snippet: Mr. Trump is trying to avoid discussion of his former campaign pledges without renouncing them, and to make conciliatory gestures without withdrawing offensive remarks....
abstract: News Analysis; Donald Trump's visit to Mexico and meeting with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto represents risky gambit to project aura of statesman open to conciliation even as he attempts to maintain his past hard-line position on immigration at rally in Arizona later on same day; it is unclear whether Trump is willing or able to perform political gymnastics required to appeal to broader general election electorate even as he holds on to his base.

byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump is trying to avoid discussion of his former campaign pledges without renouncing them, and to make conciliatory gestures without withdrawing offensive remarks.

headline.main: Trailing Hillary Clinton, Donald Trump Turns to Political Gymnastics
headline.print_headline: A Daring Plan to Lift a Campaign
